original_text: But when I found that he had committed nothing worthy of death, and that he himself hath appealed to Augustus, I have determined to send him.
korean_text: 내가 살피건대 죽일 죄를 범한 일이 없더이다 그러나 그가 황제에게 상소한 고로 보내기로 결정하였나이다

sentences.original_text: But when I found that he had committed nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 그가 아무것도 행하지 않았다는 것을 발견했을 때

sentences.original_text: and that he himself hath appealed to Augustus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 자신이 아구스도에게 호소했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: I have determined to send him
